sentences.en: A couple of fuzzy pictures have been published.
sentences.cn: 有几张模糊的照片刊登了出来。

sentences.en: Additive fuzzy measure was introduced and studied by Dan Butanriu.
sentences.cn: DanButanriu 引入并研究了Fuzzy可 加测度.

sentences.en: babies require a lot of attention, not just momentary warm fuzzies.
sentences.cn: 婴儿需要悉心照料，而不只是一时的脉脉温情。

sentences.en: First of all, you forgot about my big, bIack, fuzzy balls.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你忘了我那个巨大的黑色绒球.

sentences.en: He had fuzzy black hair and bright black eyes.
sentences.cn: 他一头柔软卷曲的黑发，眼睛又黑又亮。

sentences.en: He had little patience for fuzzy ideas.
sentences.cn: 他没什么耐心听那些糊里糊涂的想法。

sentences.en: PID + FUZZY algorithm ensure the control precision of temperature.
sentences.cn: 微电脑P. I. D自动 控制+FUZZY控制,确保控制之温度精确.

sentences.en: Product and Quotient Spaces of Fuzzy Topological Vector Spaces of Type ( QL )
sentences.cn: (QL)型Fuzzy拓扑线性空间的乘积和商空间 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: Simultaneously it also confirmed the Fuzzy - PI control is effective and successful.
sentences.cn: 同时也验证了Fuzzy-PI控制是有效和成功的.

sentences.en: Some of the photos were so fuzzy it was hard to tell who was who.
sentences.cn: 有些照片模糊不清，看不出谁是谁。

sentences.en: The border between science fact and science fiction gets a bit fuzzy.
sentences.cn: 科学事实和科幻小说之间的界限变得有点儿模糊了。

sentences.en: The lettering is fuzzy and indistinct.
The soundtrack is fuzzy in places.
sentences.cn: 这电影声带有些地方模糊不清。

sentences.en: The truck's headlights were all fuzzy and ghostlike.
sentences.cn: 卡车的前灯光模糊一片,鬼火一样.

sentences.en: There is a very close relation between fuzzy pushdown automata and fuzzy context - free grammars.
sentences.cn: :Fuzzy下推自动机与Fuzzy上下文无关文法有紧密的关系.

sentences.en: This paper presents temperature of control system based on FUZZY - PI for the production of compound fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 本文根据复合肥制造工艺要求,提出了一套基于FUZZY-PI 的温度控制系统.

words.tran_cn: 作绒毛状飞散；变成绒毛状；变得模糊
模糊的；失真的；有绒毛的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)感情上的强烈反应，意在引起感情上强烈反应的事物

trans.tran_cn: 模糊的，绒毛般的，毛茸茸的，糊涂的，含糊不清的
trans.tran_en: if a sound or picture is fuzzy, it is unclear
